<title>Alberto  Contador</title>

  <script async="" src="https://tags.refinery89.com/procyclingstats.js"></script><meta name="description" content="Alberto Contador (born 1982-12-06 in Pinto) is a former professional road racing cyclist from Spain, active between 2001 and 2017. His best results are 2 wins in GC Tour de France and 3 wins in GC Vuelta a España.">

<div class="titleCont "><div class="page-title"><div class="title"><span class="flag es w32"></span><span class="flag c24 es "></span> <h1>Alberto  Contador</h1></div></div><a class="toggleSideMenu" href="">menu</a></div>
<div class="desktop-ad leaderbord general"></div><div class="mob-ad leaderbord general"></div><div class="top-cont"></div><div class="top-cont-mobile top-cont-mobile-rider"></div>

<div class=""><div class="borderbox w100">

<div class="borderbox left w40 mb_w100">
<div class="borderbox w100"><div class="idesk">
<h4>Info</h4><div class="fs14"></div>
</div>
</div><div class="borderbox left w30 mr5"><div class="">
<a href="rider/alberto-contador/statistics"><img src="images/riders/bp/da/alberto-contador-2014.png" style="width: 100%; "></a></div>
</div><div class="borderbox left w65"><div class="">
<ul class="list">
<li class=""><div class="bold mr5">Name:</div><div class="mr10">Alberto  Contador Velasco</div></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="">
<ul class="list">
<li class=""><div class="bold mr5">Date of birth:</div><div class="mr3">6th</div><div class="mr3">December</div><div class="mr3">1982</div><div>(</div><div>42</div><div>)</div></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="">
<ul class="list">
<li class=""><div class="bold mr5">Nationality:</div><div><span class="flag es"></span> </div><div><a href="nation/spain">Spain</a></div></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="">
<ul class="list">
<li class=""><div class="bold mr5">Weight:</div><div class="mr3">61</div><div class="mr10">kg</div><div class="bold mr5">Height:</div><div class="mr3">1.76</div><div>m</div></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="">
<ul class="list">
<li class=""><div class="bold mr5">Place of birth:</div><div><a href="location/pinto">Pinto</a></div></li>
</ul>
